idea-plugin.name: RestPilot - Smart Spring Boot Client
idea-plugin.description:
The Missing Link Between Your Code and API Testing

Stop switching between IntelliJ IDEA and Postman. RestPilot allows you to generate, debug, and test your Spring Boot APIs directly from your source code.

It scans your @Controller code in real-time, intelligently analyzes your DTOs, and provides a powerful HTTP client right next to your editor.


‚ú® Key Features

  • üß† Smart DTO Analysis: Automatically recursively parses your request body classes (DTOs) to generate complete JSON payloads with default values. No more typing JSON by hand!
  • üîç Live Code Scanning: Detects @GetMapping, @PostMapping, etc., instantly. Just click the "Run" icon in the gutter to test.
  • ‚ö° cURL Interop:
    • Import: Paste any cURL command (from Chrome/Docs) to auto-fill the request.
    • Export: Copy any request as cURL to share with your team.
  • ü§ù Postman Compatible: Seamlessly import your existing Postman Collections and export your tests back to standard Postman JSON format.
  • üîå Protocol Master: Full support for Multipart Uploads (File/Text), Cookies/Session management, and diverse Auth methods (Bearer, Basic, API Key).
  • üîó Automation: Extract values from responses (e.g., Tokens) and automatically save them to Environment Variables for the next request.
  • üß≠ Bi-directional Navigation: Jump from the API tree directly to the Controller method definition with one click.

Designed for developers who want to stay in the "Flow".
